resources.string: Location permission has to be enabled
You must accept location permission for Securitly to work
Hi, i´m Emma, my battery died.
Securitly needs to know your location all the time

Do you want to enable your location?
Go to Settings -> Apps -> Securitly -> Always allow location.

Then restart Securitly
You have not selected your contacts
Send emergency message when battery level is
Are you sure you want to reset default data?
Do you want to delete this contact from your contacts list?
1. Securitly needs to know your location all the time. In order to do that, go to your device settings -> apps -> Securitly -> Permissions and change the location permission to "Allow all the time".
2.Do not force close Securitly. Otherwise, your emergency message will not be sent to your contacts.
3. We do not recommend that you set the battery level at which you will send your emergency message to 1 or 2%, as your device may turn off before sending the message.

This app was made by 5 students from the Technological Institute of Laguna, Mexico. This project began as an idea that we set out to make a reality, and together with our mentor, engineer Gerardo, we made it possible. With this app we hope to contribute a little with the current situation in the world.

My device's last location was:
latitude:

longitude: -73.969979
Central Park West Historic District
New York, 10024, EE. UU.
Securitly can\'t work because "Send SMS" permission is not granted
Securitly can\'t work because "Always Location" permission is not granted. Securitly needs to know your location so it can send your last known location to your selected contacts
There was an error getting this device\'s parsed location
Don\'t show the "location required" pop up when Securitly starts
